name: Phil Turner
tagline: Art, life, indulgence, architecture... and stuff
description: Phil is an inspirational creative with a unique set of skills. With over 25 years industry experience creating advertising campaigns, designing packaging art, directing photography and TV commercials, creating identities, brands, and brochures across all industry sectors. Phil is an ideal choice when you need an experienced professional to "get on with the job". His experience covers many different categories dealing with worldwide brands or local business start-ups.
